humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the largest tumor size for the invasive lobular carcinoma is 7 cm (Tumor size (greatest dimension): 7cm). Based on the rules provided, T3 tumors are more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage for this patient's cancer is T3.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for cancer is determined by the size of the tumor. In this report, the largest lesion in the upper outer quadrant of the right breast measures 7 x 5 x 3.8 cm. This is larger than the threshold for T3 (greater than 5 cm in greatest dimension), so the T stage for this patient is T3.
